column4: is there a way to add non-US locations to the weather calendar in evolution 2.8? (Edgy)
i'm not sure about evolution but the gnome weather applet is international, at least
I'm aware of that, thanks.  the evolution configuration file shows that it uses a US gov site for weather forecasting...  this seems to go against the gnome philosophy of internationalization
probably NOAA, right? (for the gov site)
i thought they had international forecast too but im not sure
exactly.  I haven't been able to find the international forecasts
